intro: Psychotria pallens, commonly known as the white Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its small, white or pale green flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are typically ovate to elliptical in shape and have a smooth texture. Psychotria pallens is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth.
